MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Pendre Avenue and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required to the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.10AM on 28th October 2020.
